title: Personal Protective Equipment Detection using YOLOv8
description: The project detects the presence of personal protective equipment on individuals in various settings to identify whether a person is wearing appropriate PPE, including items like helmets, masks, and safety vests.

title: Full-Stack ML Web Application for Car Price Prediction
description: Car Price Prediction application that uses a machine learning model to predict car prices based on various features such as make, model, year, mileage, engine capacity, fuel type, transmission, and location.

title: Dashboard Frontend for CarWebsite
description: A Frontend Project in React for a complete website that has buying and selling of used cars alongside car price prediction and statistics over time. Styled using MUI Material-UI Template.
